dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
A. Krevl
dcterms:description: A huge collection of movie reviews from Amazon, including reviews made up to October 2012. Reviews are on a five-point scale which are re-sampled to a three-point scale for analysis.
dcterms:title: Amazon Movie Reviews

dcterms:creator: R. He
J. McAuley
dcterms:description: Contains reviews of books from the Amazon product review database, structured similarly to the Amazon movies dataset, with a five-point sentiment scale re-sampled to three points.
dcterms:title: Amazon Book Reviews

dcterms:creator: R. He
J. McAuley
dcterms:description: Focuses on health and beauty product reviews from Amazon, structured similarly to the Amazon movies and books datasets, with a five-point sentiment scale re-sampled to three points.
dcterms:title: Amazon Health and Personal Care Product Reviews

dcterms:creator: S. Rosenthal
N. Farra
P. Nakov
dcterms:description: Pre-tagged dataset from SemEval 2017 Task A for sentiment analysis in Twitter, categorized into negative, positive, and neutral classes.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2017 Subtask A

dcterms:creator: S. Rosenthal
N. Farra
P. Nakov
dcterms:description: Dataset from SemEval 2017 Task CE for sentiment analysis in Twitter, with tweets labeled by topic and categorized into a five-point scale re-sampled to three points.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2017 Subtask CE
